= Download: Base Install =

A base install requires a clean AP install, so read and follow the [Installation installation guide] carefully. Due to the number of changes LU makes to X3AP, failure to do so will fuck up your install.  Also, [https://code.google.com/p/litcubesuniverse/wiki/03_FAQ?ts=1408552463&updated=03_FAQ#What_do_the_installers_delete? some installers wipe data]

= Export/Import Package =
[http://litcube.xtimelines.net/download.php?File=LitcubesUniverseEIV1.3.4.exe Litcube's Universe Export/Import Package V1.3.4]

In an endeavour to eliminate the incremental patching, and the confusion over when to export at which patch etc., EI scripts are now externalized.

Example: If you were going from V1.2.5 to V1.3.4

  * Install latest EI (into Main X3 directory, *not* the addon directory)
  * Export game
  * Patch to version 1.3.4
  * Import game
